meanings.definition: To utter words with the mouth
meanings.sent2: He says goodbye when he leaves.
meanings.sent3: The cat says meow when it's hungry.
meanings.sent4: The wind says whoosh as it blows through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The teacher says shh when the class is too loud.

meanings.sent1: He says he likes ice cream.
meanings.sent2: She says thank you for the gift.
meanings.sent3: The clock says tick-tock all day long.
meanings.sent4: The painting says beauty in every stroke.
meanings.sent5: The music says joy to all who listen.

meanings.sent1: She says that blue is her favorite color.
meanings.sent2: He says he believes in hard work.
meanings.sent3: The tree says it's too windy to stand straight.
meanings.sent4: The river says life flows in one direction.
meanings.sent5: The book says knowledge is power.
